title: Caffè Latte
detail: Rich and full-bodied espresso with steamed milk, topped with a bit of foam. Caffè latte is espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk.

title: Cappuccino
detail: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a thick layer of foam.

title: Caffè Mocha
detail: Espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce and steamed milk, topped with sweet whipped cream. Simply delicious.

title: Caramel Macchiato
detail: Espresso with vanilla syrup, milk, and caramel sauce on top. A classic choice in summer, with a delicious caramel drizzle.

title: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
detail: Cold brew served with a float of homemade sweet and smooth vanilla cream.

title: Cold Brew
detail: Slow-brewed cold brew with a rich, naturally sweet taste.

title: Mango Passion Frappuccino
detail: Tropical mango and passionfruit infusion, perfect with hibiscus tea and ice.

title: Raspberry Currant Frappuccino
detail: Made with fresh Teavana tea, juice, and ice.

title: Coffee Frappuccino
detail: Starbucks coffee blended with nonfat milk and ice for a lighter taste.

title: Mocha Frappuccino
detail: Mocha sauce, coffee Frappuccino, milk, and ice combined for a mocha flavor that makes you crave more.
